title: SWAT font
content:
does anyone know how the swat-font is called? I searched it on the internet but I couldn't find anything about it. so you are my last hope.   
   
tnx in advance.
author: skyman

comments.content: Hey Jean-Claude -- you should put this in the Font Identification Board for better results. Also, if you could post a sample of type? Was it from the movie [S.W.A.T.](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016223451/http:/www.sonypictures.com/homevideo/s.w.a.t./index.html)? Good luck.
